eubucco_lat_lon.parquet.description: Lightweight EUBUCCO v0.2 dataset containing building centroids (latitude/longitude) and footprint areas instead of full footprint geometries.

prediction-eval-metrics.parquet.description: Regional (NUTS 2) evaluation metrics of building attribute estimation.

building-type-harmonization.csv.description: Mapping of building types in source datasets to harmonized EUBUCCO types.
